Text: This is great stuff, wonderful footage and photography. However do not be fooled by the so-called experts. They paint a pretty human  picture when the truth is far from that.

...the same advisers who tried to drag JFK into war, but were rejected (MacNamarra etc.) immediately moved to the LBJ camp - during the flight - and started the Vietnam war with the feeble paranoid LBJ who would serve them and their masters purposes....
